body:
## What happened

## Version information

IntelliJ IDEA `2019.1.1` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 35.3.2` • Dart plugin `191.7019`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

comment_data.body: @rhymelph - can you update to a more recent version of the plugin (you're on `35.3.2`). That should address the issue.

title: bug
